t: The Martha Stewart Brand Launches ‘The World Of Martha’ In Amazon Stores - US Press Center
s: February 15, 2023 - SEATTLE—Today, Amazon and the Martha Stewart brand launch “The World of Martha” in Amazon stores, providing customers with a comprehensive, immersive shopping experience in a dedicated brand store.

t: Martha Stewart inspires shoppers with Brand Stores | Amazon Ads
s: February 8, 2024 - For more than four decades, Martha ... decided to break with tradition and establish a new home for the Martha Stewart brand by launching the “World of Martha,” a carefully curated Amazon storefront....

From beloved Martha Stewart merchandise to new finds from our favorite brands, our editors curate the best products to help elevate and improve your life. You'll find our recommendations for everything from home décor and accessories to cleaning and organizing tools—and more.

t: Here's your first look at Martha Stewart's new Amazon store, a one-stop shop for home and lifestyle essentials
s: February 15, 2023 - “There is no better place than Amazon to shop my products and recipes,” Martha Stewart, founder of the Martha Stewart brand, said of the launch. “The World of Martha offers all the essentials I love and can’t live without, in one place.

t: "The World of Martha" in Amazon Stores - The Martha Stewart Blog
